email.subject: Postdoctoral Opportunity in Software Engineering – University of Otago, New Zealand

content.introduction: Are you passionate about AI, software reliability, and making a real-world impact? Join us at the University of Otago as a Postdoctoral Fellow on our $1 million project:
content.project_title: Automating software violation detection and repair: future-proofing software reputation and skills development.
content.project_description: Software errors can have serious consequences – impacting everything from space missions to critical infrastructure. With the rise of AI-generated code and the widespread reuse of publicly available code, the risk of inheriting software vulnerabilities is greater than ever.
goals: Develop cutting-edge, AI-inspired algorithms for software violation detection and repair
Support New Zealand software developers in delivering reliable, secure, high-value software
Package our solutions to upskill under-represented groups and address the tech skills shortage
content.call_to_action: If you have a background in software engineering, AI, or related fields and want to contribute to future-proofing software development, we want to hear from you!
content.share_invitation: Feel free to share or tag someone who might be interested!
